products.title: La Lagartija
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... A perfect start to your journey.

products.title: El Tigre
products.description: A dark coffee with hints of grapefruit and caramelized peanuts.

products.title: La Cucaracha
products.description: Sweet with notes of caramel, orange, and strawberry.

about.description1: Who are we? Just a bunch of friends with a love for a good coffee and desire to create something new, something original.
about.description2: Our coffees reflect us - young, wild and free. We are on the journey of new tastes...

employees.name: Elizabeth Doherty
employees.quote: Experienced barista from Bahamas. She says that Venezuela has opened her eyes on coffee. “It’s not about the taste”, she says. “It’s all about the feelings”.

employees.name: Max Selfish
employees.quote: Max is the austrian barista with years of experience from the hotels across the whole Europe. “Venezuela coffee was a lightening experience for me! I have never drunk such an amazing coffee!”, he says.

employees.name: Ping Nihao
employees.quote: Ping is the youngest in the team. He doesn’t like calling coffee a mysterious act. He says, a good coffee is like a mathematical formula. Once you figured it out, every coffee you make is a masterpiece.
